info.name: osu!simple
info.description:
You can apply your own wallpaper in the advanced settings below.
This was made to satisfy what I wanted the website to look like. This is not a conceptual theme like the previous osu!next conceptual theme.
Wallpapers that have more going on in them are more likely to look good.
info.additionalInfo:
Please tell me of any problems with the theme. Username on osu! is White Tiger.

Changelog:

11/14/2017: 
- Fixed the leaderboard flags becoming misaligned when using osuplus
- Fixed non-square avatars intruding the space of the username
- Lowered the background blur due to performance issues
- Fixed non-themed items related to beatmap subscription using osuplus
- Fixed support page being completely broken
- Minor spacing adjustments

5/26/2017: 
- Fixed backmap packs not expanding properly

5/15/2017: 
- Fixed forum breakcrumbs
- Theme'd the support page and blog posts for osu!weekly
- Fixed user earned kudosu on the userpage
